definition: best feature/most important part of an object/quintessence/essence/soul
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to take the best/to absorb the essence

take the cream, discard the dross (political and educational slogan)/keep what is good, discard the rest/You need to be selective when studying./In modernizing the country, don't accept uncritically all foreign ideas.
pinyin: qu3 qi2 jing1 hua2 , qu4 qi2 zao1 po4

sentences.english: We continued our select coastal journey in Fujian, which boasts scenic beauty and a brilliant cultural tradition.
sentences.chinese: 我们在风光秀美，文化灿烂的福建继续海疆精华之旅。

sentences.english: Would you like to use ampoule?
sentences.chinese: 请问你喜欢加精华素吗？

sentences.english: Relationalism is the essence of practical materialism and Piagets theory.
sentences.chinese: 关系论是实践唯物主义和皮亚杰学说的精华。

sentences.english: The extracted oriental and occidental essence is embodied by a combination of undecorated quality and fashionable elements.
sentences.chinese: 提炼中西精华，不经装饰的特质与时尚元素相结合。

sentences.english: The area along the Changjiang River region in Anhui was the essence of economic and social.
sentences.chinese: 皖江地区是安徽省经济社会发展的精华所在。

sentences.english: Apply BF1 Hair Growth Conditioner onto scalp. Gently massage for 5 minutes then rinse Off.
sentences.chinese: 把护发精华搽在头皮上，按摩5分钟，把头发洗净。

sentences.english: Lounge patrons desperately wanted to imbibe the essence of all this.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的老主顾们极欲将全部精华吸收殆尽。

sentences.english: This is the essence of Justin's apology.
sentences.chinese: 这是查士丁为基督教辩护的精华之所在。

sentences.english: These trees are the creme de la creme in britain's landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这些树是英国自然景观中之精华。

sentences.english: And the Ancient Nanfeng Klin is the symbol of fine art.
sentences.chinese: 而南风古灶正是集陶艺之精华的地方。

sentences.english: The censors eviscerated the book to make it inoffensive to the President.
sentences.chinese: 审查员删去了该书的精华以取悦于总统。

sentences.english: ATV will offer real live broadcast matches and highlights for soccer fans to enjoy at home.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲电视将作现场直播及作精华介绍。

sentences.english: Tengyue Supernatural Horse Art epitomizes the essences of the local art of the Central Plains and Yunnan Province in China.
sentences.chinese: 腾越神马艺术集中了中原及云南本土艺术的精华。

sentences.english: He founded in 1998 Xiaodian District essence auto repair shop.
sentences.chinese: 他于1998年创立小店区精华汽车修理厂。

sentences.english: The first six chapters are the gold of this volume.
sentences.chinese: 开始的六个章节是本卷书的精华所在。

sentences.english: One package of Cerasilk Aging & Wrinkle Defying Serum contains 60 capsules.
sentences.chinese: 每一盒抗皱紧肤延缓老化精华含有60片胶囊。

definition: to concentrate (a liquid)/concentration/espresso coffee/abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
